ygData.msgSnippet: I got mine from Riverdale also. ... From: Maelstrom [mailto:Maelstrom@bengruber.com] Sent: Friday, April 23, 1999 4:03 PM To: eq_wizards@onelist.com Subject:
ygData.messageBody:
I got mine from Riverdale also.

-----Original Message-----
From: Maelstrom [mailto:Maelstrom@...]
Sent: Friday, April 23, 1999 4:03 PM
To: eq_wizards@onelist.com
Subject: [eq_wizards] Re: Halo of Light ****SPOILER*****


If you are interested in the Location of the Halo of Light Spell it is in
the Wizards Guild in Felwithe.
When you enter the guild you see Tarkas (I think that's his name) and there
are two passages out
of the room left and right...they both circle around but it's less confusing
if you take the Left
passage. At the end of the hall make a left and at the corner make another
left...go through the
door, and the first merchant on the right sells the Halo of Light spell.


----- Original Message -----
From: Ken Lee <mailto:kenlee@...>
To: Maelstrom@... <mailto:Maelstrom@...>
Sent: Friday, April 23, 1999 3:24 PM
Subject: Halo of Light

Is this available in Felwithe? I'm in Ak'anon right now, but nothing in
queynos, or freeport...

Zalbar
14th Human Wizard
Solusek Ro
